name: Big Smoke's Train Chase
description:
Made for the 2022 mobile game jam hosted by @Stepford

PLAYABLE ON PC AND MOBILE

UPDATE: I fixed the glitch where the controls didn't work.

The konami code now works, try it on the title screen and see what happens!

Follow the damn train and get your chicken back from dem vagos!

Parody of the "Wrong Side Of The Tracks" mission from Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas.

Also idk why people complain that this mission is annoying and hard cuz I beat it first try.

DRIVE 200 MILES TO BEAT THE GAME

CREDITS

Coding: Me

Engine: Scratch (yeah that crappy site)

Pictures from: GTA SA og and "definitive", GTA lll "definitive", Cookie Run, Doritos Reaction, @dudgns964, Getty Images, etc.

Music from: Super Mario Kart, Friday Night Funkin', Pokémon Snap, Sonic CD, and Pokémon Heartgold Soulsilver.
